title: Drawing, "Four Allegories of Commedia and Tragedy"
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: inscribed on recto: la tragedia e la comedia; il genio della tragedia e comedia tempio dapollo e muse; la fama sono A nome dei poeti tragico e comici; interno del tempio d apollo Apollo incorona la tragedia e la comedia.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Four Allegories of Commedia and Tragedy".
Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1487.
